languages.text: {n}Средь обломков весов и пылающих знамен Арбитес, все собравшиеся как один преклоняют колено. Вердикт вынесен. Что бы ни таило в себе будущее, ясно одно — Простор Коронус не останется прежним.{/n}

{n}Among the broken fragments of the great scales and the burning Arbites banners, the people kneel as one. The verdict has been announced. Whatever the future may hold, one thing is certain: the Koronus Expanse will not be the same.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Средь обломков весов и пылающих знамен Арбитес, все собравшиеся как один преклоняют колено. Вердикт вынесен. Что бы ни таило в себе будущее, ясно одно — Простор Коронус не останется прежним.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Among the broken fragments of the great scales and burning Arbites banners, the people kneel all as one. The verdict has been announced. Whatever the future may hold, one thing is certain: the Koronus Expanse will not be the same.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zwischen den zerstören Überresten der mächtigen Schalen und den brennenden Bannern der Arbites knien die Leute auf dem Boden- Der Urteilsspruch wurde verkündet. Was auch immer die Zukunft bringen mag, eines ist sicher. Die Koronus-Ausdehnung wird nie mehr dieselbe sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the broken fragments of the great scales and the burning Arbites banners, the people kneel as one. The verdict has been announced. Whatever the future may hold, one thing is certain: the Koronus Expanse will not be the same.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zwischen den zerstören Überresten der mächtigen Schalen und den brennenden Bannern der Arbites knien die Leute auf dem Boden- Der Urteilsspruch wurde verkündet. Was auch immer die Zukunft bringen mag, eines ist sicher. Die Koronus-Ausdehnung wird nie mehr dieselbe sein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parmi les fragments brisés de la grande balance et les bannières en flammes de l'Arbites, les gens s'agenouillent tous en même temps. Le verdict a été rendu. Quoi que l'avenir puisse réserver, une chose est certaine : les Étendues de Koronus ne seront plus jamais les mêmes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the broken fragments of the great scales and the burning Arbites banners, the people kneel as one. The verdict has been announced. Whatever the future may hold, one thing is certain: the Koronus Expanse will not be the same.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parmi les fragments brisés de la grande balance et les bannières en flammes de l'Arbites, les gens s'agenouillent tous en même temps. Le verdict a été rendu. Quoi que l'avenir puisse réserver, une chose est certaine : les Étendues de Koronus ne seront plus jamais les mêmes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在巨大天平的碎片之中，在法务部熊熊燃烧的旗帜之下，所有人都跪在你面前。最终判决已然宣判。尽管无人知晓未来如何，但有件事情确凿无疑——科罗努斯扩区的面貌必将不同以往。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the broken fragments of the great scales and the burning Arbites banners, the people kneel as one. The verdict has been announced. Whatever the future may hold, one thing is certain: the Koronus Expanse will not be the same.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在巨大天平的碎片之中，在法务部熊熊燃烧的旗帜之下，所有人都跪在你面前。最终判决已然宣判。尽管无人知晓未来如何，但有件事情确凿无疑——科罗努斯扩区的面貌必将不同以往。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Entre los fragmentos rotos de la gran balanza y los estandartes ardientes del Arbites, la gente se inclina al unísono. El veredicto queda dictado. Nadie sabe qué pasará en el futuro, pero una cosa está clara: la Extensión de Koronus nunca volverá a ser la misma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the broken fragments of the great scales and the burning Arbites banners, the people kneel as one. The verdict has been announced. Whatever the future may hold, one thing is certain: the Koronus Expanse will not be the same.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Entre los fragmentos rotos de la gran balanza y los estandartes ardientes del Arbites, la gente se inclina al unísono. El veredicto queda dictado. Nadie sabe qué pasará en el futuro, pero una cosa está clara: la Extensión de Koronus nunca volverá a ser la misma.{/n}

languages.text: {n}割れた大天秤の破片と燃え盛る高等裁定局の旗の間で、民衆は一斉にひざまずいた。判決は下ったのだ。未来がどう動こうと、ただ一つ確かなことがある。コロヌス・エクスパンスは、もはや以前の姿ではない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the broken fragments of the great scales and the burning Arbites banners, the people kneel as one. The verdict has been announced. Whatever the future may hold, one thing is certain: the Koronus Expanse will not be the same.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}割れた大天秤の破片と燃え盛る高等裁定局の旗の間で、民衆は一斉にひざまずいた。判決は下ったのだ。未来がどう動こうと、ただ一つ確かなことがある。コロヌス・エクスパンスは、もはや以前の姿ではない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Büyük terazinin kırık parçaları ve yanan Arbites sancakları arasında halk, tek vücut olup diz çöküyor. Karar açıklandı. Geleceğin nelere gebe olduğu bilinmez ancak kesin olan bir şey var: Artık Koronus Enginliği'nde hiçbir şey eskisi gibi olmayacak.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the broken fragments of the great scales and the burning Arbites banners, the people kneel as one. The verdict has been announced. Whatever the future may hold, one thing is certain: the Koronus Expanse will not be the same.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Büyük terazinin kırık parçaları ve yanan Arbites sancakları arasında halk tek vücut olup diz çöküyor. Karar açıklanmıştır. Geleceğin nelere gebe olduğu bilinmez ancak kesin olan bir şey vardır: Artık Koronus Enginliği eskisi gibi olmayacaktır.{/n}
